rule: The output must describe the background of the photo.
input: A vibrant street carnival in a sunny plaza full of colorful decorations and happy people. The photo should feel lively and festive.
validityText:
The given input describes a desired AI photo of a street carnival. The description is written in a single paragraph, focuses on the subjects (colorful decorations, happy people), includes details on timing (sunny plaza) and lighting (sunny), describes the background and setting (plaza, carnival atmosphere), and conveys the feeling the image should evoke (lively and festive). The input is also written in English and combines artistic insight with precise imagery. 

OK
coverageText: Create a vibrant photo of a street carnival in a sunny plaza, brimming with colorful decorations and happy, joyful people. Capture the scene in bright daylight, with sunlight enhancing the vivid hues of banners, balloons, and streamers. Ensure the background displays historic buildings with charming balconies adorned with flowers. The photo should feel lively and festive, evoking a sense of joyous celebration and community spirit.
coverageEvalText:
The output from the chatbot complies with the description provided. It is a single paragraph with a detailed prompt under 80 words, covering the subject (street carnival with joyful people), characteristics (colorful decorations, banners, balloons, streamers), timing and lighting (bright daylight with sunlight), background (historic buildings with balconies and flowers), and the feeling to be evoked (lively, festive, joyous celebration, community spirit).

OK
